                                        float maxQuality)
        Description copied from interface: SecurityDAO
        Retrieves the list of experts matching the filter from the database
        Specified by:
        getExpertsByFilter in interface SecurityDAO
        Parameters:
        minRank - the minimum rank of expert (i.e rank 1)
        maxRank - the maximum rank of expert (i.e rank 100)
        minRep - the minimum reputation of the expert
        maxRep - the maximum reputation of the expert
        minQuality - the minimum report quality of the expert
        maxQuality - the maximum report quality of the expert
        Returns:
        a list of all experts matching the given filters
